name: La Vie Moderne de THREEQUEL
description:
An entry for Oktrollberfest 2022.

Once again, another ZZT game parody! Just go through the Dungeons of ZZT, get the four Cyan keys, get out, and have fun! You'll be fine, there's nothing screwy about the Dungeons at all!

HOW TO PLAY

Upon loading, press W to open the World menu, then select THREEQUL.

Arrows move, Shift + Arrows throw throwing knives.

SPECIAL THANKS TO

WiL and kkairos for hosting Oktrollberfest 2022. (Extra-special thanks to WiL for Weave 2.7q, putting up with my questions about ZZT-OOP in Weave, and getting Weave to work on the Museum of ZZT and here!)

Espilan for finding two-game breaking bugs I missed. This is why sleep is important, folks! :v
